h2_title: Best Spirits to Use in Black Myth: Wukong
content:
Wandering Wight| Guangmou| Tiger's Acolyte  
---|---|---  
Blade Monk| Non-White| Falcon Hermit  
Clay Vajra| Flint Vanguard| Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang (Upgraded)
